entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
